actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution to amend the Constitution to provide for representation of the District of Columbia in the Congress.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides for the representation of the District of Columbia in the Congress. Authorizes the election of two Senators and the number of Representatives in the House to which the District would be entitled if it were a State. Provides that this amendment shall have no effect upon the present system for selecting the number of electors for President and Vice President to be appointed for the District.

titles.title: Joint resolution to amend the Constitution to provide for representation of the District of Columbia in the Congress.
